resources.string: State of the game would be renewed
Prepare bag of roles and pass it to players
Wait 3–5 minutes and start voting process
Wake all minions, show THIS IS THE DEMON card point to the Demon
Wake Demon, show THESE ARE YOUR MINIONS card point to the minions. Show THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY card. show prepared bluffs
These characters are not in play
Each night, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp

Wake the Imp. The Imp points at any player. The chosen player dies — put the Imps Kill reminder by the chosen players character token If the Imp killed themself at night, choose an alive Minion and replace their character token with a Imp token. Wake the new Imp, show them the YOU ARE info token, then show them the Imp token
Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day
Wake the Poisoner. They point at any player. Put the POISONED reminder token by the chosen players character token
Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good - as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead
Wake the Spy and show them the Grimoire for as long as they need
You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk
Put the Washerwomans TOWNSFOLK reminder token by any Townsfolk character token, and put the Washerwomans WRONG reminder token by any other character token
Wake the Washerwoman and point to the players marked TOWNSFOLK and WRONG. Show the character token marked TOWNSFOLK to the Washerwoman
You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider(Or that zero are in play)
Put the Librarians OUTSIDER reminder token by any Outsider character token, and put the Librarians WRONG reminder token by any other character token
Wake the Librarian and point to the players marked OUTSIDER and WRONG. Show the character token marked OUTSIDER to the Librarian
You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion
Put the Investigators MINION reminder token by any Minion character token, and put the Investigators WRONG reminder token by any other character token
Wake the Investigator and point to the players marked MINION and WRONG. Show the character token marked MINION to the Investigator
You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are
Wake the Chef. Show the Chef fingers (0, 1, 2, etc.) equaling the number of pairs of neighboring evil players
Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil
Wake the Empath. Show them fingers (0, 1, or 2) equaling the number of evil players neighbouring the Empath
Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you
Put the Fortune Tellers RED HERRING reminder token by any good character token, marking that player as the Red Herring
Wake the Fortune Teller. The Fortune Teller points at any two players. If either chosen player is a Demon or the Red Herring, nod your head yes. Otherwise, shake your head no
Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too
Wake the Butler. They point at any player. Mark this player with the MASTER reminder token
During a nomination, the Butler may only have their hand raised to vote if the Master has their hand raised to vote or if the Masters vote has already been counted

Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight. The Monks protection also prevents all other harmful effects of the Demons ability, such as poisoning or turning the protected player evil
Wake the Monk. The Monk points at any player except themself. If the Demon attacks the player marked SAFE, the player remains alive
If there are 5 or more players alive and the Demon dies, you become the Demon
If the Demon dies and there were five or more alive players immediately before the Demon died, replace the Scarlet Woman token with a spare Demon token. show them the YOU ARE info token
If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character
If the Ravenkeeper died tonight, wake them. They point at any player. Show the chosen players character token to the Ravenkeeper
Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today
if any player died by execution today, wake the Undertaker. Show the character token marked DIED TODAY to the Undertaker
If a player dies by execution, put the Undertakers DIED TODAY reminder token by the dead players character token
You are safe from the Demon
If only 3 players live and no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead
Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die
The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately
If you die by execution, your team loses
You might register as evil and as a Minion or Demon, even if dead
You can mark Recluse with Evil token for remind you its looks like evil
There are extra Outsiders in play(+2)
While setting up the game, remove any two Townsfolk character tokens and add any two Outsider character tokens
You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not
Return to Settings screen and remove Drunk role. Add some Townsfolk role. After setting up mark some Townsfolk as Drunk
You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion
Wake the Clockmaker. Show fingers (1, 2, etc.) equaling the distance in players from the Demon to the nearest Minion, starting with the player neighboring the Demon closer to that Minion
You start knowing a good player and their character. If the Demon kills them, you die too
Choose a Grandchild by marking any good character with the GRANDCHILD reminder
Wake the Grandmother and show them the character token marked GRANDCHILD, then point at the Grandchild player, then put the Grandmother to sleep
If the Demon kills the Grandchild, the Grandmother dies
Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesnt wake tonight
Wake the Exorcist. They point at any player. Mark the chosen player’s character token with the CHOSEN reminder. Put the Exorcist to sleep
Each night*, you learn if a Demon voted today
Each dawn, mark the Flowergirl with the DEMON NOT VOTED reminder. if the Demon votes for any execution, replace the DEMON NOT VOTED reminder with the DEMON VOTED reminder
Wake the Flowergirl. If the Flowergirl is marked DEMON NOT VOTED, shake your head no. If the Flowergirl is marked DEMON VOTED, nod your head yes
Each night*, you learn how many dead players are evil
Wake the Oracle. Show fingers (0, 1, 2, etc.) equaling the number of dead evil players
Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question
Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment

Wake the Seamstress. They either shake their head no or point at any two players except themself. f they point at two players, either nod your head yes (to indicate these players have the same alignment) or shake your head no (to indicate these players do not have the same alignment). mark seamstress with the NO ABILITY
You think you are a Demon, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are and who you choose at night
Once all tokens have been returned to you, swap the positions of the Lunatic and Demon tokens in the Grimoire

Wake the Lunatic and act as if they are the Demon. Show them the THESE ARE YOUR MINIONS info token and point to a number of players equaling the number of Minions in play. Show any three good character tokens as bluffs. During the first night, wake the Demon. Show them the YOU ARE info token, then their Demon token. Show them the THIS PLAYER IS info token, then the Lunatic token, then point at the Lunatic player

Wake the Lunatic to act as if they were that Demon. Put a CHOSEN reminder on each player they chose, then put them to sleep. Wake the real Demon, point at the Lunatic, show the Lunatic token to the real Demon, and point at the players that the Lunatic chose. Then the Demon acts as normal
If you are "mad" about being an Outsider, you might be executed
When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on
If the Sweetheart dies, you choose any one player to become drunk - mark this player with the DRUNK reminder. The Sweetheart does not lose this ability when dead
You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [-1 or +1 Outsider]
Before putting the character tokens in the bag, either remove one Townsfolk and add one Outsider or remove one Outsider and add one Townsfolk
Wake the Godfather. Show them the character tokens of all Outsiders in play
If an Outsider dies during the day, mark them with the DIED TODAY reminder
If an Outsider dies during the day, That night, wake the Godfather. They point at any player, they dead
Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not
Wake the Godfather. Show them the character tokens of all Outsiders in play
You think you are a good character, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are. [You neighbor the Demon]

Return to Settings screen and remove Marionette role. Add some Townsfolk role. After setting up mark Demon neighbor good player as Marionette. During the first night, Wake the Demon. Point to the player marked IS THE MARIONETTE and show the Marionette character token
Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbors are poisoned
The two Townsfolk neighboring the No Dashii become poisoned - mark them with POISONED reminders
Wake the No Dashii. They point at any player. That player dies. put Kill
Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy

Wake the Pukka. They point at any player. Put the Pukka to sleep. The chosen player is poisoned — mark them with a POISONED reminder, the other player marked POISONED dies — mark them with a DEAD reminder
